thread.title: Quinn: Apple's store at home - Times-Standard
thread.title_full: Quinn: Apple's store at home - Times-Standard - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Times-Standard
title: Quinn: Apple's store at home - Times-Standard
text:
Just as greenthumbs might flock to the San Francisco Botanical Garden or architecture buffs might tour the Frank Lloyd Wright Civic Center in Marin County, so now can Bay Area techies visit the gleaming new Apple store at the company headquarters in Cupertino. Part showroom, part temple, the store displays all the whimsy and pizzaz one expects from Apple while making 1 Infinite Loop visitors sense that they are close to the magic created at the world-famous campus.
 Times-Standard.
